Apple TV Publishing

1. Image files to generate the App Icon

As Apple TV requires layered image icons that creates a sense of depth and vitality we are offering to create the App Icon to for you. Please upload the following images, so that we can generate your app icon.

Note: All images for the Ap Icon need to be transparent PNG files. Required image size: 1280x768 px

-max size 5mb
-max size 5mb
-max size 5mb

2. Image file to generate the Top Shelf Images

Your static top shelf image will be displayed when your app is in the top row of the Home Screen and in focus.

Depending on the TV screen size of the user the top shelf image might be cropped - safe area is middle 1920px.

-max size 5mb

3. We submit your app to Apple’s App Store

We’ll do the app submission for you. Tappla does not charge you any setup fees for the submission, but an Apple Developer Account ($99/year) is needed to publish your app live.

To prepare your app for the App Store some more information is needed from your end. Please click the button below to give us all the mandatory info and access keys.
